trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> object on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control is owner-drawn or system-drawn.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>物件上<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>控制項是主控描繪或系統繪製。

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個列舉型別的成員來設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>類別</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>的屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>的值

trans-unit.source: The Style property determines the way in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性會決定的方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>隨即出現。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects can display simple text or be owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>物件可顯示簡單的文字，或做為主控描繪。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: Owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects support displaying images or a different font from the rest of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, while system-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are used to display only text (or text and an icon if an icon is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).
trans-unit.target: 為主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>物件顯示影像或與其餘不同的字型支援<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>物件上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項，while 系統繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>物件可用來顯示純文字 (或文字和圖示的圖示中指定如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To perform the owner-draw operations on an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 主控描繪上執行作業描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> is drawn by the owner.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> displays text in the standard font.
